sentences.english: Ruth thought it more likely that his silver tongue had got around her.
sentences.chinese: 鲁斯认为，凭他的三寸不烂之舌，很有可能说服她。

sentences.english: He has a glib tongue. Few people can argue him down.
sentences.chinese: 他有三寸不烂之舌，几乎没人能驳倒他。

sentences.english: He has an eloquent tongue. (or:He has a glib tongue. )
sentences.chinese: 他有一条三寸不烂之舌。

sentences.english: Tom has a silver tongue， and he can persuade John to give up his crazy plan.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆会用他三寸不烂之舌说服约翰放弃他的疯狂计划。

sentences.english: I am afraid you have been taken in by the glib tongue of the salesman.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你上了那个三寸不烂之舌的推销员的当。

sentences.english: By dint of the strength of eloquence scold you the Zu fairy in the grave get up to say apology for me.
sentences.chinese: 凭着三寸不烂之舌骂得你坟里的祖仙起来给我说道歉。

sentences.english: Peter often said that his mother "could talk the back leg off a donkey".
sentences.chinese: 彼得常说他妈有一条三寸不烂之舌。

sentences.english: He talked his way past a detective who stopped him.
sentences.chinese: 他靠三寸不烂之舌使一个拦住他的侦探将他放行了。
